product_name: Brunton Echo Mid-Size 10 x 32 Binoculars - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The affordable Brunton Echo Mid-Size 10 x 32 Binoculars are lightweight, fogproof and waterproof, making them great for everyday use. Binoculars are nitrogen-purged for a stable atmosphere inside, making them fogproof and waterproof. Twist-up eyecups with multi-step long eye relief allow comfortable viewing with eyeglasses. Easy-to-use center-hinge focus and Bak-4 roof prism optics make binoculars light and compact. Fully coated optics for improved light transmission; diopter adjustment to correct for eye variation. Rubber armor protects binoculars from bumps and falls while providing a good grip. Brunton Echo Mid-Size 10 x 32 Binoculars include a protective carrying case and neck strap. Overstock.
short_description: The affordable Brunton Echo Mid-Size 10 x 32 Binoculars are lightweight, fogproof and waterproof, making them great for everyday use.
